nodes.text: The Flamestrike Legion was a military organization that defended the Bamula sector from foreign insurrections before the rise of the Galactic Empire. Small and well trained, the Flamestrike Legion was a cohesive unit that wore a distinctive mustard-yellow armor. Although they had a reputation for being invincible, they met their match against the Empire and were forcibly disbanded. Norjax Thall previously served in the Flamestrike Legion.
